title: Friendly Fire
description: The ultimate voting game. 100 questions to find out who your friends really think you are.

cards.content: Most likely to accidentally join a cult?
Most likely to survive a zombie apocalypse?
Most likely to become a meme?
Most likely to trip over nothing while walking on a flat surface?
Most likely to forget someone's name immediately after meeting them?
Most likely to marry a stranger in Vegas?
Most likely to cry during a sad commercial?
Most likely to send a screenshot to the person they were screenshotting?
Most likely to become a millionaire by accident?
Most likely to get arrested for doing something incredibly stupid?
Most likely to sleep through a fire alarm?
Most likely to win a reality TV show?
Most likely to adopt a stray animal they found on the street?
Most likely to laugh at a funeral (or an inappropriate moment)?
Most likely to drop their phone in the toilet?
Most likely to text their ex after two drinks?
Most likely to go missing on a night out?
Most likely to become a famous influencer?
Most likely to fake their own death to start a new life?
Most likely to get a tattoo they will regret immediately?
Most likely to spend all their rent money on food?
Most likely to fall in love with a waiter/waitress?
Most likely to lock themselves out of their own house?
Most likely to break a bone doing something simple?
Most likely to check their phone during sex?
Most likely to marry for money?
Most likely to quit their job on the spot?
Most likely to eat something off the floor?

Most likely to have a secret snack stash?
